.table mother
----
application/datalog

.table father
----
application/datalog

parents{child: C, mother: M, father: F} :-
  mother{child: C, mother: M} &
  father{child: C, father: F}.
----
application/datalog

sibling{left: L, right: R} :-
  parents{child: L, mother: M, father: F} &
  parents{child: R, mother: M, father: F} &
  L != R.
----
application/datalog

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Pete", "M": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "mother", output: record{rec: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.

father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Pete", "F": "Paul", "M": "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "parents", output: record{rec: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 3}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Pete", "F": "Paul"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "2", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Pete", "F": "Paul", "M": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 2}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "5", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 6}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "5", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 7}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "1", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Pete", "F": "Paul"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "father", output: record{rec: father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 4}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "4", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 5}.

mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "mother", output: record{rec: mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.

father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Carolyn", "F": "Paul", "M": "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "parents", output: record{rec: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 3}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Carolyn", "F": "Paul"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "2", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Carolyn", "F": "Paul", "M": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 2}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "7", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 8}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "sibling", output: record{rec: sibling{left: "Carolyn", right: "Pete"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 12}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "5", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 6}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "5", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary", "R": "Pete"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 6}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "7", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 10}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "sibling", output: record{rec: sibling{left: "Pete", right: "Carolyn"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 13}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "5", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 7}.
eval.step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "5", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Pete", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 7}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "1", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Carolyn", "F": "Paul"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "father", output: record{rec: father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "L": "Carolyn", "M": "Mary"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 4}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "4", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "Paul", "M": "Mary", "R": "Carolyn"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 5}.

mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}.
----
application/datalog
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"C": "Steve", "M": "Jill"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 1}.
eval.step{input: record{rec: mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}}, inputMult: 1, node: "mother", output: record{rec: mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}}, outputMult: 1, step: 0}.

mother{child: C, mother: M}?
----
application/datalog
mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}.
mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
mother{child: "Steve", mother: "Jill"}.

mother{child: C, mother: "Mary"}?
----
application/datalog
mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}.
mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
